subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Paul Stastny’s first career 5-point game led the Colorado Avalanche to a 6-2 victory against the visiting San Jose Sharks. Stastny had a goal and four assists for the Avalanche, which broke open a close game with four goals in the third period.
